project_title: MetaBow: A Digital Revolution for String Instruments
main_features: Miniaturized sensor and prototype housing unit for violin, viola, cello, and double bass bows
9DoF IMU (accelerometer, gyroscope, magnetometer) integrated into MetaBoard sensor
Real-time bow movement tracking (speed, tilt, pressure, position)
IC touch sensor and haptic feedback capacitor
DIY-friendly installation without altering playing technique
53+ design iterations for optimal balance between functionality and usability

reward_tiers.name: Tote Bag
reward_tiers.includes: Limited edition MetaBow branded tote bag

reward_tiers.name: Mounted MetaBow Quartet
reward_tiers.includes: Quartet Dev Kit: housing & sensors for 2 violin, 1 viola, 1 cello
